BAD GIRLS is the smash hit ITV drama series set behind the bars of a women's prison. Seperated from their homes, children and lovers, the women struggle to cope with the harsh reality of this hidden world. BAD GIRLS doesn't shy away from portraying the cruelties and tense relationships inside the prison system, but it also captures the warmth and humour needed to survive it.
